subject: Re: displaying tests results/errors in a servlet/jsp
msgSnippet: ... implement. It would be too much :) I m looking for a servlet/jsp way to use the test suite. http:// /AllTests Alain Ravet Brussels,
messageBody:
--- In junit@y..., "Erik Hanson" <ehanson@n...> wrote:
> Would a JUnit applet be sufficient? That should be pretty easy to
implement.

It would be too much :)

I'm looking for a servlet/jsp way to use the test suite.
http://<production.app.url>/AllTests


Alain Ravet
Brussels, Belgium
